doc.title: Paranormal
doc.plot: Having escaped a string of abusive relationships Jen Chapman was devastated by the sudden mysterious death of her baby Amy. Whilst trying to come to terms with her loss she follows the advice of a close friend, forcing herself to make a change. She decides to move and searches for a cheap apartment within the suburbs. The apartment isn't what she's after but its all she can afford so she settles there. However Jen starts to think something is wrong. She begins to have paranormal experiences and as the activity increases Jen makes a discovery about its origin.
